name: Gengar
author: Keiji Kinebuchi
flavor_text: Under a full moon, this Pokémon like to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokémon). This power can’t be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Dark Mind
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
